{"id":1032727853,"question_id":3019,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"9 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1693103687,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1032727853/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Furthest Point From Origin","memory":"41.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int furthestDistanceFromOrigin(String moves) {\n        int left=0, right=0, mid=0;\n        \n        for(char ch : moves.toCharArray()){\n            \n            if(ch=='L'){\n                left++;\n            }else if(ch=='R')\n                right++;\n            else\n                mid++;\n            \n        }\n        \n        return left>right? left+mid-right : right-left+mid;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"furthest-point-from-origin","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
